thread.title: Dollar Rises as Consumer Outlook Brightens
thread.title_full: Dollar Rises as Consumer Outlook Brightens - WSJ

author: James Ramage
title: Dollar Rises as Consumer Outlook Brightens
text:
The dollar strengthened against the euro and the yen on Friday after a measure for U.S. consumer sentiment rose this month, suggesting optimistic households could boost growth heading into the end of the year.
The dollar increased 0.2% against the common currency, as one euro bought $1.1368. The dollar increased 0.4% against the yen to Â¥119.43. The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the greenback against a group of 16... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
